title: 2018 Description, Obamacare, Go Home for X-mas, Couples NY Resolution, Side Piece Story, Who Said What, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: 2018 Description, Obamacare, Go Home for X-mas, Couples NY Resolution, Side Piece Story, Who Said What, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The crew describes their 2018. Obamacare is still available to those in need and the deadline is December 15. J. Anthony Brown murders another one for Christmas. Cosmopolitan magazine has suggestions for couples and what they can do together in the new year. We have sidepiece etiquette for both genders courtesy of Fools #1 and #2. There are popular phrases that we know of and here we get to find out their origin. Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve talks about the power of light plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
